text: This subchapter shall apply, 120 days after the promulgation of the final regulations pursuant to § 31-3254, to health insurers, as defined in § 31-3251(5), and any agency, organization, facility, or distinct part thereof, licensed pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 44.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 14-96, see notes following § 31-3251.

DC CODE § 31-3255

Current through December 11, 2012
